name: Bees N Bubbles
description:
Bees N Bubbles is a 2D game made for "Brain Station 23 presents Hack A Jam 2021".

Instructions:
  • Use the cursor to move the Bee.
  • Clash with appropriate Bubbles to score and replenish.
  • Press LMB to Activate/Deactivate "Bad is Good" mode.
  • Bad is Good mode is activated in the start.

On Bad is Good mode ACTIVE:

  • Golden Bubble will score point.
  • Transparent Bubble will reduce life.
  • Life will automatically decrease little by little.

On Bad is Good mode INACTIVE:

  • Golden Bubble will reduce life.
  • Transparent Bubble will increase life.
Credits:

Background music by "syncopika"

Sprites by "Lexatchison"
